title: Components
description: A description of components used in the application

display_name.title: Component Display Name
display_name.description: The human-readable name to display on the component

component.title: Component Registration
component.description: The fully qualified class name used to register the component

remapping.title: Component Remapping
remapping.description: The remapping rules for the component node name and namespace

name.title: Node Name
name.description: The remapping rules for the component node name

namespace.title: Node Namespace
namespace.description: The remapping rules for the component node namespace

input_collections.title: Input collections
input_collections.description: Collections of input signals of the component

^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.title: Input topics
^[a-z]([a-z0-9_]?[a-z0-9])*$.description: The array of topics that are included in the signal collection

events.title: Component Events
events.description: Component event sources that can trigger events

transitions.title: Component State Transitions
transitions.description: Component state transitions that can trigger events

on_load.description: Trigger events when the component is loaded

on_configure.description: Trigger events when the lifecycle component has been successfully configured and is in the configured state

on_activate.description: Trigger events when the lifecycle component has been successfully activated and is in the active state

on_deactivate.description: Trigger events when the lifecycle component has been successfully deactivated and is in the configured state

on_cleanup.description: Trigger events when the lifecycle component has been successfully cleaned up and is in the unconfigured state

on_shutdown.description: Trigger events when the lifecycle component has been shut down and is in the finalized state

on_error.description: Trigger events when the lifecycle component has raised an error and is in the ErrorProcessing transition state

on_unload.description: Trigger events when the component is unloaded

predicates.title: Component Predicates
predicates.description: Component predicates that can trigger events
